thread.title: Richard King

author: Richard King
title: Richard King
text: I think it's incredibly sneaky to hide additional costs in the check box section after you've entered your payment details. If transparency was your aim, these would be highlighted before getting to this stage to make it easier to spot and also amend your booking to counteract the costs. I was also refused the companies official complaints procedure when I contacted them. Won't use again, you can negotiate the same deal or better directly with the rental company or use a cashback website and get it cheaper!
